overview: Iria and Noelia have long been maintaining a secret relationship. One day Iria arrives at Noelia's home with the news that he has left her husband and she told him everything. At first everything seems to be going well, they can be together without problems. Throughout the day Noelia thinks about the decision that Iria has taken and realizes about the fear that this gives to her. She loves Iria, but the fears begin to overtake her. She tells her everything she thinks, knowing that she can lose her and the damage she's doing to her. Iria had already made a decision about them but she has to think again about his future.
title: Under the Sheets
